verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the fifteenth <S%G4003><s%> year <S%G2094><s%> of the reign <S%G2231><s%> of Tiberius <S%G5086><s%> Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> Pontius <S%G4194><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> being governor <S%G2230><s%> of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> being tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> of the region <S%G5561><s%> of Ituraea <S%G2484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Trachonitis, <S%G5139><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Lysanias <S%G3078><s%> tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> of Abilene, <S%G9><s%>

in <S%G1909><s%> the high priesthood <S%G749><s%> of Annas <S%G452><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the region around <S%G4066><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> remission <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of the words <S%G3056><s%> of Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> <S%G3004><s%> "The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> <S%G4160><s%> 'Make ready the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> paths <S%G5147><s%> straight. <S%G2117><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> valley <S%G5327><s%> will be filled. <S%G4137><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hill <S%G1015><s%> will be brought low. <S%G5013><s%> <S%G2532><s%> The crooked <S%G4646><s%> will become <S%G2071><s%> straight, <S%G2117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the rough <S%G5138><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%> <S%G1519><s%> smooth. <S%G3006><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> will see <S%G3700><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s salvation. <S%G4992><s%>'"

He <S%G3004><s%> said therefore <S%G3767><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> who went out <S%G1607><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "You offspring <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> warned <S%G5263><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> to flee <S%G5343><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> to come? <S%G3195><s%>

Bring forth <S%G4160><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> fruits <S%G2590><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of repentance, <S%G3341><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> begin <S%G756><s%> to <S%G3962><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> among yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> <S%G2192><s%> 'We have Abraham <S%G11><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> our father; <S%G3962><s%>' for <S%G1063><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to raise up <S%G1453><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> to Abraham <S%G11><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> stones! <S%G3037><s%>

Even <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> the axe <S%G513><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> lies <S%G2749><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the root <S%G4491><s%> of the trees. <S%G1186><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that doesn't <S%G3361><s%> bring <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> is cut down, <S%G1581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thrown <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the fire. <S%G4442><s%>"
The <S%G2532><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> must we do? <S%G4160><s%>"

He answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "He who has <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> coats, <S%G5509><s%> let him give <S%G3330><s%> to him who has <S%G2192><s%> none. <S%G3361><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> who has <S%G2192><s%> food, <S%G1033><s%> let him do <S%G4160><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>"

Tax collectors <S%G5057><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to be baptized, <S%G907><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> must we do? <S%G4160><s%>"

He <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "Collect <S%G4238><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> that which is appointed <S%G1299><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>"

Soldiers <S%G4754><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What about us? <S%G5101><s%> What must <S%G4160><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> do? <S%G4160><s%>" He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "Extort from <S%G1286><s%> no one <S%G3367><s%> by violence, <S%G3366><s%> neither accuse <S%G4811><s%> anyone wrongfully. <S%G4811><s%> Be content <S%G714><s%> with <S%G3800><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> wages. <S%G3800><s%>"

As <S%G1161><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> were in <S%G1722><s%> expectation, <S%G4328><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> all men <S%G3956><s%> reasoned <S%G1260><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> whether <S%G3379><s%> perhaps he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G5547><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them <S%G537><s%> all, <S%G537><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with water, <S%G5204><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he comes <S%G2064><s%> who is <S%G3450><s%> mightier than <S%G2478><s%> I, <S%G846><s%> the latchet <S%G2438><s%> of whose <S%G3739><s%> sandals <S%G5266><s%> I <S%G846><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> to loosen. <S%G3089><s%> He <S%G846><s%> will baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fire, <S%G4442><s%>

whose <S%G3739><s%> fan <S%G4425><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he will thoroughly cleanse <S%G1245><s%> his <S%G846><s%> threshing floor, <S%G257><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will gather <S%G4863><s%> the wheat <S%G4621><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> barn; <S%G596><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he will burn <S%G2618><s%> up the chaff <S%G892><s%> with unquenchable <S%G762><s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>"
Then <S%G2532><s%> with many <S%G4183><s%> other exhortations <S%G3870><s%> he <S%G2097><s%> preached good news <S%G2087><s%> to the people, <S%G2992><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch, <S%G5076><s%> being reproved <S%G1651><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> Herodias, <S%G2266><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>'s <S%G5376><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> had done, <S%G4160><s%>

added <S%G4369><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> them all, <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G2532><s%> he shut up <S%G2623><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prison. <S%G5438><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> it happened, <S%G1096><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> were baptized, <S%G907><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> had been baptized, <S%G907><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was praying. <S%G4336><s%> The sky <S%G3772><s%> was opened, <S%G455><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> in a bodily <S%G4984><s%> form <S%G1491><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the sky, <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> "You <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> I am well pleased. <S%G2106><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> himself, <S%G846><s%> when he began <S%G756><s%> to teach, <S%G5616><s%> was about thirty <S%G5144><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> old, <S%G2094><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> (as <S%G5613><s%> was <S%G2242><s%> supposed <S%G3543><s%>) of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> the son of Heli, <S%G2242><s%>
the son of Matthat, <S%G3158><s%> the son of Levi, <S%G3017><s%> the son of Melchi, <S%G3197><s%> the son of Jannai, <S%G2388><s%> the son of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%>
the son of Mattathias, <S%G3161><s%> the son of Amos, <S%G301><s%> the son of Nahum, <S%G3486><s%> the son of Esli, <S%G2069><s%> the son of Naggai, <S%G3477><s%>
the son of Maath, <S%G3092><s%> the son of Mattathias, <S%G3161><s%> the son of Semein, <S%G4584><s%> the son of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> the son of Judah, <S%G2455><s%>
the son of Joanan, <S%G2490><s%> the son of Rhesa, <S%G4488><s%> the son of Zerubbabel, <S%G2216><s%> the son of Shealtiel, <S%G4528><s%> the son of Neri, <S%G3518><s%>
the son of Melchi, <S%G3197><s%> the son of Addi, <S%G78><s%> the son of Cosam, <S%G2973><s%> the son of Elmodam, <S%G1678><s%> the son of Er, <S%G2262><s%>
the son of Jose, <S%G2499><s%> the son of Eliezer, <S%G1663><s%> the son of Jorim, <S%G2497><s%> the son of Matthat, <S%G3158><s%> the son of Levi, <S%G3017><s%>
the son of Simeon, <S%G4826><s%> the son of Judah, <S%G2455><s%> the <S%G2501><s%> son of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> the son of Jonan, <S%G2494><s%> the son of Eliakim, <S%G1662><s%>
the son of Melea, <S%G3190><s%> the son of Menan, <S%G3104><s%> the son of Mattatha, <S%G3160><s%> the son of Nathan, <S%G3481><s%> the son of David, <S%G1138><s%>

the son of Amminadab, <S%G284><s%> the son of Aram, <S%G689><s%> the son of Hezron, <S%G2074><s%> the son of Perez, <S%G5329><s%> the son of Judah, <S%G2455><s%>
the son of Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> the son of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> the son of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> the son of Terah, <S%G2291><s%> the son of Nahor, <S%G3493><s%>
the son of Serug, <S%G4562><s%> the son of Reu, <S%G4466><s%> the son of Peleg, <S%G5317><s%> the son of Eber, <S%G1443><s%> the son of Shelah, <S%G4527><s%>
the son of Cainan, <S%G2536><s%> the son of Arphaxad, <S%G742><s%> the son of Shem, <S%G4590><s%> the son of Noah, <S%G3575><s%> the son of Lamech, <S%G2984><s%>
the son of Methuselah, <S%G3103><s%> the son of Enoch, <S%G1802><s%> the son of Jared, <S%G2391><s%> the son of Mahalaleel, <S%G3121><s%> the son of Cainan, <S%G2536><s%>
the son of Enos, <S%G1800><s%> the son of Seth, <S%G4589><s%> the son of Adam, <S%G76><s%> the son of God. <S%G2316><s%>
